markdownRemark.excerpt:
Freckles and fairies
farms and the farthest galaxies
the browns in your eyes and the brightest stars
I detest the dichotomy
I desist from all my machinations
I…
markdownRemark.html: Freckles and fairies farms and the farthest galaxies the browns in your eyes and the brightest stars I detest the dichotomy I desist from all my machinations I’ve gone through with it too far time is so annoyingly linear stars and songs, they keep me occupied solos and the sun, I get by life. there will be a day of amnesia the perfectly imperfect clarity of thought and memories where you don’t exist and I don’t dream radiation will be poison and biology ignoble. the typewriter will be stashed, the papers burnt hey, you can’t be bothered if your mind is lost.
